about_the_game:
Brok discovers an underground bar in the depths of the Slums. He is never one to turn down a fight, and now he can use his past boxer skills to prove he's the ultimate fighter!



This additional content explores new aspects of the BROK the InvestiGator fighting gameplay (expect 80% action and 20% adventure/visual novel) with an innovative and addictive approach to Beat' Em Up action, providing hours of entertainment!

  • 60+ varied challenges
  • 10 new characters and enemies
  • Make new friends in the bar
  • Boxer outfit for Brok
  • Play as Brok, Graff, Ott, R.J. and more
  • Exclusive music tracks, stages & hazards
  • Achievements to unlock
  • Play co-op with your friends, or fight them in versus multiplayer
  • Survival mode
...and more!

F.A.Q.


- How do I access this content?

Enter the leftmost door in the hacker street (the one with the "Grand opening soon" banner). If you have finished the game at least once with a "main ending" on any save file, the banner should be gone and the door should be open. Just interact with it.

- Do I absolutely have to finish the main game before playing this content?

No, you can also access the DLC through the main menu, or by clicking the door in the hacker street twice and choosing to enter. You may get spoilers by doing so, though!

- What save file should I choose?

It doesn't matter. The DLC progress is kept independant from the main game. EXP and Unis in particular are not used.

- How hard is it?

You can play all challenges on "relaxed" difficulty if needed. Additionally, you can skip challenges that are still too hard for you by spending C-Tokens (the bar currency).

- I'm not interested in combat; should I play this anyway?

Combat is the main focus of this DLC. However you'll still get to talk with various characters in the bar and experience a short story in the game universe. It is recommended you play if you enjoyed combat in the main game, but don't if you skipped all the fights.

Controller or keyboard highly recommended. Mouse alone won't get you far here!

Accessibility note


This DLC offers a similar level of accessibility as the main game. However, due to the concept and often the big number of enemies and hazards on screen, it is not recommended for blind players as it requires precision and fast reflexes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 or 11 (64 bits)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 5000, Nvidia or ATI card with at least 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (64 bits)
  • Processor: 2.5 Ghz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 2GB or AMD Radeon HD 7770 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: All-action additional content for BROK the InvestiGator. Fight your way through new enemies, tackle crazy challenges, and make new friends!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
